00049 class CSwordBackend : public SWMgr {
00050 public:
00055   enum FilterOptions {
00056     footnotes,
00057     strongNumbers,
00058     headings,
00059     morphTags,
00060         lemmas,
00061         hebrewPoints,
00062         hebrewCantillation,
00063         greekAccents,
00064         filterOptionsMIN = footnotes,
00065         filterOptionsMAX = greekAccents
00066     };
00067 
00068   struct FilterOptionsBool {
00069     bool footnotes;
00070     bool strongNumbers;
00071     bool headings;
00072     bool morphTags;
00073         bool lemmas;
00074         bool hebrewPoints;
00075         bool hebrewCantillation;
00076         bool greekAccents;
00077     };
00078     struct DisplayOptionsBool {
00079         bool lineBreaks;
00080         bool verseNumbers;
00081     };
00082   enum ErrorCode {
00083         noError,
00084         noSwordConfigFile,
00085         noSwordModuleDirectory,
00086         noSwordModuleConfigDirectory,
00087         noModulesAvailable,
00088         unknown
00089     };
00090 
00096     CSwordBackend();
00100     virtual ~CSwordBackend();
00107   virtual ListCSwordModuleInfo* const moduleList() const;
00113   virtual const ErrorCode initModules();
00119   virtual const bool shutdownModules();
00126   void setOption( const CSwordBackend::FilterOptions type, const bool enable);
00127   void setFilterOptions( const CSwordBackend::FilterOptionsBool options);
00128   void setDisplayOptions( const CSwordBackend::DisplayOptionsBool options);
00134   virtual const bool isOptionEnabled( const CSwordBackend::FilterOptions type);
00138     virtual void Load();
00142   const QString booknameLanguage( const QString& = QString::null );
00148   virtual CSwordModuleInfo* const findModuleByDescription(const QString& description);
00154   static const QString findModuleNameByDescription(const QString& description);
00160   CSwordModuleInfo* const findModuleByName(const QString& name);
00164   SWConfig* const getConfig() const;
00169   const bool moduleConfig(const QString& module, SWConfig& moduleConfig);
00173   static const QString optionName( const CSwordBackend::FilterOptions option);
00177   static const QString configOptionName( const CSwordBackend::FilterOptions option);
00181   static const QString translatedOptionName(const CSwordBackend::FilterOptions option);
00185   virtual const SWVersion Version();
00186     
00187 protected:
00192     virtual void AddRenderFilters(SWModule *module, ConfigEntMap &section);
00193     
00194 private:
00195     //filters
00196     SWFilter *m_gbfFilter;
00197     SWFilter *m_plainTextFilter;
00198     SWFilter *m_thmlFilter;     
00199     ListCSwordModuleInfo* m_moduleList;
00200     ErrorCode m_errorCode;
00201     CHTMLChapterDisplay*    m_chapterDisplay;   
00202     CHTMLEntryDisplay*      m_entryDisplay; 
00203 };

00207     return m_moduleList;
00208 }
